decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is control, utilizing Atraxa, Grand Unifier as the commander. The deck focuses on manipulating and disrupting the opponent's gameplay through a wide range of spells and abilities. It includes a variety of counterspells, such as Counterspell, Force of Will, and Mana Leak, to prevent opponents from resolving key threats. Removal spells like Abrupt Decay, Damn, and Swords to Plowshares allow the player to deal with problematic permanents on the board. The deck also includes cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Teferi, Time Raveler to provide additional control and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to maintain control of the game and hinder the opponent's progress in order to secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Grenzo, Dungeon Warden's ability to put creatures with power 2 or less from the bottom of your library directly onto the battlefield. By running a low mana curve full of Goblin creatures and burn spells, the deck aims to swarm the board quickly and deal damage to the opponent at a fast pace. The inclusion of cards like Goblin Lackey and Imperial Recruiter helps to tutor for key creatures, while cards like Goblin Chieftain and Legion Warboss provide anthem effects to pump up the team. The deck also includes disruption elements like Thoughtseize and Pyrokinesis to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain pressure on the board.

This deck focuses on utilizing Raffine, Scheming Seer as the commander to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategies while applying pressure with an aggressive game plan. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal spells, countermagic, and disruptive creatures to slow down the opponent's game plan. It also includes strong card advantage engines like Dark Confidant, Brazen Borrower, and Teferi, Time Raveler to stay ahead in resources. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to the colors needed for the spells in the deck. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy while presenting threats to end the game quickly.

This deck focuses on using the Aggro strategy with Slimefoot and Squee as the commanders. The deck includes a variety of cards that focus on quickly dealing damage to the opponent and controlling the board. Cards like Goblin Bombardment and Flame Slash help to deal damage efficiently, while cards like Elves of Deep Shadow and Elvish Mystic help to ramp up mana quickly. The deck also includes cards like Survival of the Fittest and Demonic Tutor for searching key cards and maintaining card advantage. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with quick aggression and efficient removal spells while maintaining board presence with token generation and recursion effects.
